question:
La Palma is being considered as an alternative site for the development of the world’s largest ground-based telescope. In this context, consider the following statements about this island:
  1. It is located in the Pacific Ocean, in the Northern Hemisphere.
  2. It is a part of Hawaiian Islands.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: La Palma is located in the Atlantic Ocean. It is being considered for the development of a secondary site for the Thirty Meter Telescope Project, in the Northern hemisphere. This is in context with the protests surrounding its construction in the Mauna Kea of Hawaii.  Statement 2 is incorrect: La Palma is a part of the Canary Islands. It is a part of Spain. It is the most north-western island in the archipelago. It is a volcanic ocean island. It already houses the Roque de los Muchachos Observatory.
